languages.text: {n}Паскаль поясняет с непонятной гордостью:{/n} "Технобрат Авель посвятил вам малую арию. Это произведение отличается высоким уровнем акустической гармонии и хорошо подходит для использования в качестве девиза, вспомогательного идентификатора или эпитафии".

{n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль поясняет с непонятной гордостью:{/n} "Технобрат Авель посвятил вам малую арию. Это произведение отличается высоким уровнем акустической гармонии и хорошо подходит для использования в качестве девиза, вспомогательного идентификатора или эпитафии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは不可解な自尊心をもって説明した。{/n}「技術同胞アベルは陛下に低位のアリアを捧げました。このかけらは高度な音のハーモニーで区別されており、モットー、補助的識別子、あるいは墓碑に適したものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは不可解な自尊心をもって説明した。{/n}「技術同胞アベルは陛下に低位のアリアを捧げました。このかけらは高度な音のハーモニーで区別されており、モットー、補助的識別子、あるいは墓碑に適したものです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡开了口，语气中带着难以言喻的自豪。{/n}“技术兄弟亚伯为你献上了一首小小的咏叹调。这首咏叹调的声音非常和谐，可以用作座右铭、辅助标识符或墓志铭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡开了口，语气中带着难以言喻的自豪。{/n}“技术兄弟亚伯为你献上了一首小小的咏叹调。这首咏叹调的声音非常和谐，可以用作座右铭、辅助标识符或墓志铭。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal erklärt mit unverhohlenem Stolz:{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel hat Euch eine kleine Arie gewidmet. Das Werk zeichnet sich durch große akustische Harmonie aus und kann als Leitmotiv, Hilfsidentifikator oder Nachruf eingesetzt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal erklärt mit unverhohlenem Stolz:{/n} "Tech-Bruder Abel hat Euch eine kleine Arie gewidmet. Das Werk zeichnet sich durch große akustische Harmonie aus und kann als Leitmotiv, Hilfsidentifikator oder Nachruf eingesetzt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se lance dans des explications avec une fierté qui ne manque pas de vous surprendre :{/n} « Le technofrère Abel vous a dédié une aria mineure. Le morceau se distingue par son haut niveau d'harmonie acoustique et serait parfaitement adapté pour une devise, un identifiant secondaire ou encore une épitaphe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se lance dans des explications avec une fierté qui ne manque pas de vous surprendre :{/n} « Le technofrère Abel vous a dédié une aria mineure. Le morceau se distingue par son haut niveau d'harmonie acoustique et serait parfaitement adapté pour une devise, un identifiant secondaire ou encore une épitaphe. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te ofrece una explicación con un inexplicable aire de orgullo.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel le ha dedicado un aria menor. La pieza se distingue por un alto grado de armonía acústica, y resulta adecuada para utilizarla como lema, como sobrenombre auxiliar o como epitafio».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te ofrece una explicación con un inexplicable aire de orgullo.{/n} «El tecnohermano Abel le ha dedicado un aria menor. La pieza se distingue por un alto grado de armonía acústica, y resulta adecuada para utilizarla como lema, como sobrenombre auxiliar o como epitafio».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, esrarengiz bir gururla durumu açıklıyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel size alt seviye bir arya ithaf etti. Bu parça, üst düzey akustik armonisiyle diğerlerinden ayrılır ve bir düstur, ikincil bir kimlik veya mezar yazıtı olarak kullanılmaya uygundur."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal explains, with an inexplicable air of pride,{/n} "Tech-Brother Abel has dedicated a lesser aria to you. The piece is distinguished by a high degree of acoustic harmony, and is fit for use as a motto, auxiliary identifier, or epitaph."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal esrarengiz bir gururla durumu açıklıyor:{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Abel size alt seviye bir arya ithaf etti. Bu parça üst düzey akustik armonisiyle diğerlerinden ayrılır ve bir düstur, bir tanımlayıcı takviyesi veya bir mezar yazıtı olarak kullanılmaya uygundur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
